mapper.sql: id, addTime, deleteStatus, code, content, name, sequence, parent_id
mapper.insert: insert into ezs_dict (id, addTime, deleteStatus, code, content, name, sequence, parent_id) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deleteStatus,jdbcType=BIT}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sequence,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{parent_id,jdbcType=BIGINT})

insert into ezs_dict
id,
addTime,
deleteStatus,
code,
content,
name,
sequence,
parent_id,

mapper.update:
update ezs_dict
addTime = #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
deleteStatus = #{deleteStatus,jdbcType=BIT},
code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sequence = #{sequence,jdbcType=INTEGER},
parent_id = #{parent_id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update ezs_dict set addTime = #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, deleteStatus = #{deleteStatus,jdbcType=BIT}, code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sequence = #{sequence,jdbcType=INTEGER}, parent_id = #{parent_id,jdbcType=BIGINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ezs_dict A WHERE A.`code` = #{code} and A.deleteStatus=0
SELECT * FROM ezs_dict B WHERE B.parent_id = ( SELECT A.id FROM ezs_dict A WHERE A.`code` = #{code} ) and B.deleteStatus=0
select name from ezs_dict where id = #{propertyId}
